page.title: 11Yarm Fair
page.content: { { Yarm Fair}first began in 1874.The family who first bought it passed away and{Weigh and Tolls Committee took over. The present problem is that lots of new residants don't like the fair because of the noise,lack of car parking,and shops not being open as they usually would be. The 18th 19th and the 20th of October are the traditional dates of the fair.These days however the fair is held on days nearest to the traditional dates as possible. When it arrives on the Tuesday police block off the road.The fair itself opens on Thursdays and stays open till midnight for three days.
